The Luxe Nomad x Japan

Collaboration Proposal

Oh hey Luxe Nomad. Let's make some magic together.

We've got a vision.


We're a group of content creators heading on a press trip to Japan to explore an off-the-beaten path itinerary -- starting with a week of snowboarding in Niseko


We would love to stay exclusively in your properties, capturing photo & video content for your social media as well as promoting The Luxe Nomad to our audiences.

Our crew

We're a group of content creators and influencers who take incredible pride in creating content for brands that tells a story. We have adventure photographer Jess Bonde ( @wildbonde , travel and lifestyle photographer Emilio ( @eyesofanomad , professional model and influencer Rachel Bowler ( @rachelbowler_ and micro-influencer Tina May ( @hellotinamay .

We collectively have experience working with hundreds of companies from all over the world showcasing their brand personality. We'll be travelling with a full professional setup -- Canon 5D Mk IV, Panasonic GH5, Mavic Pro 2 Drone, etc -- ready to create high resolution content for your brand.

The experience you need

We've worked car companies, local and international fashion & lifestyle brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, tour companies and more. Our work has been featured by BBC, NYtimes, CNN, Discovery and is re-shared by major instagram accounts like @artofvisuals and @moodygrams on a regular basis.

Niseko is one of the hottest destinations in Japan. We want to help you make The Luxe Nomad the only obvious choice.

Our Pitch

We'll be exploring Niseko for 1 week from the 7th March - 14th March and would love to partner with you for our accomodation needs. In exchange, we could offer ...

  • 15x high resolution professionally edited photos of Niseko for your social media & web use.
  • 15x high resolution professionally edited photos of the villa or property for your social media & web use.
  • 1x 30 second promotional video of the villa or property
  • 1x 30 second promotional video of The Luxe Nomad Niseko
  • Mention in a minimum of 4 separate instagram stories on each persons instagram account (total 16 stories)
  • 2 dedicated instagram posts tagging @theluxenomad on each persons instagram account (total 8 posts)
